column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: A Chinese worker suffered injuries after a collapse at a Chinese construction site.------This happened on March 9
column6: Sihanoukville. The accident victim was taken to hospital in Sihanoukville.------According to the security guards at the construction site
column7: the worker was preparing concrete when the floor collapsed
column8: trapping him. Luckily his injuries were not life threatening.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/294032
